title: The Teaching Ambassadors: International Teaching Fellowships
creator_contributor_role: Victoria. Ministry of Education, production company
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Educational exchanges - Australia
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Teachers - In service training
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Teachers - Training of
description: Looks at the International Fellowship Scheme which operates in Victoria. Highlights the professional development aspects of the project, the influence visiting participants have on school communities and the input gained by schools upon the return of Victorian recipients. Featured speakers include: Rex Murfett, Susan Gianevsky, Richard Wood, Alex McKnight and Kevin Collins.
